channel.title: Official VMFs?
channel.description: I was wondering if Black Mesa will release a handful of the official VMF map files to demonstrate some "best practices" examples, much like what Valve did with the d1_trainstation levels and Source SDK, or the example maps in Left 4 Dead. I couldn't find any in the common/Black Mesa folder. I think experienced mappers can piece together a lot of stuff on their own, but having an example VMF or two would be nice.

item.title: Official VMFs?
item.dc:creator: Maki
item.description:
Cool! Thanks for the reply.

Read full topic

I was wondering if Black Mesa will release a handful of the official VMF map files to demonstrate some “best practices” examples, much like what Valve did with the d1_trainstation levels and Source SDK, or the example maps in Left 4 Dead. I couldn’t find any in the common/Black Mesa folder. I think experienced mappers can piece together a lot of stuff on their own, but having an example VMF or two would be nice.
